-  </welcome-file-list>
-</web-app>

@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@ +<%@ page language="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8"%> +<% +String path = request.getContextPath(); +String basePath = request.getScheme()+"://"+request.getServerName()+":"+request.getServerPort()+path+"/"; +%> + + + + + + + Failure + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +
